sentences.en: " Last year, China saw a 39 % increase in contractual FDI, reaching US $ 115 billion . "
sentences.cn: 去年在中国的合同外资金额增长了39%, 达到了 一千一百五十亿 美元.

sentences.en: Controlar y administrar los subcontratos individuales relacionados con el Objeto Contractual.
sentences.cn: 保证在所有合同项目的施工中履行健康、安全和环境的技术要求.

sentences.en: Hiring of contractual labor is fast becoming the norm.
sentences.cn: 契约劳动的雇用快速成长也成为一项规范.

sentences.en: I acknowledge that this Agreement is a legally binding contractual agreement.
sentences.cn: 本人确认此为具有法律约束力的合约协议.

sentences.en: Its credIt'situation is in their mutual contractual relationship formation and performance.
sentences.cn: 其信用状况也是其相互契约关系中形成和表现的.

sentences.en: NDT services are now very much a part of contractual obligations.
sentences.cn: NDT服务现在是合同双方义务的很大一部分.

sentences.en: Partners are taxed as individuals and are personally liable for torts and contractual obligations.
sentences.cn: 合伙人按个人纳税,且以个人名义承担侵权和合同责任.

sentences.en: Preparing and managing contractual claims and all contract administration matters for projects.
sentences.cn: 负责项目合同管理、索赔等合同行政工作.

sentences.en: The arbitrator issued a final decision regarding the meaning of the contractual terms.
sentences.cn: 仲裁员签发了有关合同条款含义的最后裁决.

sentences.en: The builders failed to meet their contractual obligations.
sentences.cn: 建筑商没能履行合同中规定的义务.

sentences.en: The house of the horoscope involved rules all sorts of contractual commitments.
sentences.cn: 这个星象的这个宫包涵了支配所有契约承诺的种类.

sentences.en: The rate of contractual savings will increase in the long run.
sentences.cn: 长远来说,合约存款定会增加.

sentences.en: Therefore, the inside - circle - relation trade inheres the contractual relationship of corporate internalization.
sentences.cn: 因此, 这种“关系圈内”的交易具有企业内化的契约关系.

sentences.en: Tutors have a contractual obligation to research and publish.
sentences.cn: 老师们在合同的约定中有责任做研究和发表文章.

sentences.en: We fought our way there, and our continuing presence rested on contractual rights.
sentences.cn: 我们是打进去的, 而且我们留驻那里是依据协议上所规定的权力.

words.tran_cn: 合约地；合同性地；契约规定地

phrases.tran_cn: n. 契约式合营企业；合约式联营企业
